love.author: William Shakespeare
love.quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.

love.author: Lao Tzu
love.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

love.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
love.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.

love.author: Helen Keller
love.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.

love.author: Paulo Coelho
love.quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.

love.author: Victor Hugo
love.quote: To love or have loved, that is enough. Ask nothing further.

love.author: Leo Tolstoy
love.quote: All, everything that I understand, I only understand because I love.

love.author: Mahatma Gandhi
love.quote: Where there is love there is life.

love.author: Emily Dickinson
love.quote: That love is all there is, is all we know of love.

love.author: Robert A. Heinlein
love.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.

love.author: Aristotle
love.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

love.author: Rumi
love.quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you.

love.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
love.quote: I love you not only for what you are but for what I am when I am with you.

love.author: Jane Austen
love.quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.

love.author: Dr. Seuss
love.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

love.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
love.quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.

love.author: Khalil Gibran
love.quote: Love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.

love.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
love.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.

love.author: Nicholas Sparks
love.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.

love.author: Pablo Neruda
love.quote: I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.

love.author: Audrey Hepburn
love.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

love.author: Emily Brontë
love.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.

love.author: Mother Teresa
love.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

love.author: George Sand
love.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.

love.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
love.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you... I could walk through my garden forever.

love.author: Marilyn Monroe
love.quote: The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes.

love.author: John Green
love.quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.

love.author: E.E. Cummings
love.quote: You are my sun, my moon, and all my stars.

love.author: Honore de Balzac
love.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
